meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 風呂 means "bath?" Well the <kanji>store</kanji> you pay to take a bath in is the <vocabulary>public bathhouse</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This word consists of the jukugo word 風呂 and the kun'yomi reading for 屋. You've learned all of these readings, so you should be able to read this already too!
